name: School of Conjuration
description: Conjurers specialize in summoning creatures and objects from elsewhere.

2.name: Minor Conjuration
2.description: You can conjure a small, nonmagical object in your hand.

6.name: Benign Transposition
6.description: You can teleport or swap places with a willing creature.

10.name: Focused Conjuration
10.description: Your concentration on conjuration spells canâ€™t be broken by damage.

14.name: Durable Summons
14.description: Creatures you summon gain additional hit points.
